auth.verify_email_description: Before continuing, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just sent you? If you didn't receive the email, we'll gladly send you another one.
auth.verification_link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided in your profile settings.

profile.profile_info_description: Update your profile information and email address.
profile.resend_verification_link: Click here to resend the verification email.
profile.verification_link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
profile.password_description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
profile.delete_account_description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information you wish to retain.
profile.delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
profile.delete_account_warning: Once your account is deleted, all of its data will be permanently erased.
profile.two_factor_description: Add additional security to your account using two-factor authentication.
profile.two_factor_not_enabled: You have not enabled two-factor authentication.
profile.two_factor_when_enabled: When two-factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.
profile.two_factor_finish_enabling_scan: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.
profile.two_factor_enabled_scan: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key.
profile.two_factor_recovery_codes_store: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two-factor authentication device is lost.
profile.browser_sessions_description: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
profile.browser_sessions_info: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
profile.logout_other_sessions_confirmation: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions across all of your devices.

subscription.title: Premium Subscription
subscription.faq_1_question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
subscription.faq_1_answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your Premium access will remain active until the end of the paid period.
subscription.faq_2_question: What payment methods do you accept?
subscription.faq_2_answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure partner Stripe.
subscription.faq_3_answer: Yes, you can switch between monthly and yearly plans at any time from your subscription management page.
subscription.success_message: Thank you for your subscription! You now have access to all Premium features of Zero Waste Recipes.
subscription.benefit_1: Enjoy the AI menu generator to plan your meals
subscription.benefit_2: Use the barcode scanner to manage your pantry
subscription.benefit_3: Discover personalized recipes based on your preferences
subscription.grace_period_info: Your subscription is canceled but remains active until this date
subscription.reactivate_info: You can reactivate it at any time before the end date
subscription.cancel_info: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Premium access will remain active until the end of the paid period.
subscription.view_invoices_stripe: You can view your invoices directly on Stripe.
subscription.cancel_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will retain Premium access until the end of the current period.
subscription.resume_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to reactivate your subscription? You will be charged according to your current plan.

upgrade.barcode_scanner_desc: Scan barcodes to quickly add products to your pantry with all nutritional information.
upgrade.anti_waste_desc: Discover personalized recipes to use your ingredients before they expire.
upgrade.advanced_stats_desc: Access detailed statistics about your recipes, environmental impact, and savings.
upgrade.pantry_limit: Limit of {limit} items reached for free users
upgrade.meal_plan_limit: Limit of {limit} recipes per week for free users

jetstream.welcome_description: Laravel Jetstream provides a beautiful, robust starting point for your next Laravel application. Laravel is designed to help you build your application using a simple, powerful, and enjoyable development environment. We believe you should love expressing your creativity through programming, so we have spent time carefully crafting the Laravel ecosystem to be a breath of fresh air. We hope you love it.
jetstream.documentation_description: Laravel has wonderful documentation covering every aspect of the framework. Whether you are a beginner or have previous experience with Laravel, we recommend reading our documentation from beginning to end.
jetstream.laracasts_description: Laracasts offers thousands of video tutorials on Laravel, PHP, and JavaScript development. Check them out, see for yourself, and massively level up your development skills in the process.
jetstream.tailwind_description: Laravel Jetstream is built with Tailwind, an amazing utility-first CSS framework that doesn't get in your way. You'll be amazed at how easily you can build and maintain fresh, modern designs with this wonderful framework at your fingertips.
jetstream.authentication_description: Authentication and registration views are included with Laravel Jetstream, as well as support for user email verification and resetting forgotten passwords. So, you're free to get started with what matters most: building your application.
